Set the map bounds.

set_bounds.Rd

Set the map bounds.

Usage

set_bounds(map, bounds, padding = 50, maxZoom = map$maxZoom)

Arguments

map

The map or map proxy object.

bounds

A list of two lists, each containing longitude and latitude pairs. For example: list(list(-79, 43), list(-73, 45)).

padding

The padding around the bounds in pixels. Default is 50.

maxZoom

The maximum zoom level to set. Default is the object's maxZoom.

Value

   The map or map proxy object for chaining.

On this page
